last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter 07: Sun
last_episode_to_air.overview: Waking up to a new reality, the Inland and Offshore factions inch closer to the brink of war — until a long-lost artifact offers a ray of hope.

overview: In a future where the elite inhabit an island paradise far from the crowded slums, you get one chance to join the 3% saved from squalor.

episodes.name: Chapter 01: Cubes
episodes.overview: In a grimy near-future, 20-year-olds stream to a sleek testing facility to compete for a spot in an idyllic land known as the Offshore.

episodes.name: Chapter 02: Coins
episodes.overview: Fernando's medical exam yields a stunning discovery, a logic puzzle stokes tension in the group, and Aline tries to find out what Ezequiel is hiding.

episodes.name: Chapter 03: Corridor
episodes.overview: A nerve-wrecking trip through a dark tunnel leaves Joana haunted by a vision from her past. Ezequiel recieevs an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Chapter 04: Gateway
episodes.overview: Trapped in the dorms without food and water, the candidates race to find a solution. A studden change in the test brings out a new side of Marco.

episodes.name: Chapter 05: Water
episodes.overview: Painful memories come flooding back to Ezequiel as Aline reveals she's learned and offers to keep it quiet - for a price.

episodes.name: Chapter 06: Glass
episodes.overview: Candidates find a tempting offer waiting for them in their new dorm rooms. Those who decide to stay face dauting individual tests.

episodes.name: Chapter 07: Capsule
episodes.overview: A night of celebration turns chaotic as Process officials realize there's a traitor in their midst and begin interrogating the candidates.

episodes.name: Chapter 08: Button
episodes.overview: On the morning of the Purification Ritual, starting revelations and shifting loyalties leave the fates of four candidates hanging in the balance

episodes.name: Chapter 01: Mirror
episodes.overview: With days to go before the next Process, Joana tries to prove herself to the leader of the Cause, and Michele faces an ultimatum from Ezequiel.

episodes.name: Chapter 02: Toaster
episodes.overview: As Rafael races to score a spot on the Inland squad, flashbacks recap his first year in the Offshore. Fernando reluctantly coaches Process hopefuls.

episodes.name: Chapter 03: Static
episodes.overview: Desperate to protect Glória, Fernando realizes there's another way to stop the Process. Michele and Rafael separately try to contact the Cause.

episodes.name: Chapter 04: Napkin
episodes.overview: Ivana and Joana subject their captives to grueling interrogations to find out who's telling the truth. Marcela reaches out to an Inlander for help.

episodes.name: Chapter 05: Lamp
episodes.overview: Michele and the others discover another side to Ezequiel as he retraces his turbulent journey from Process No. 80 to the present.

episodes.name: Chapter 06: Bottles
episodes.overview: As the hunt for Cause members heats up, Glória wrestles with nagging doubts, Michele and Joana search for the bomb, and Fernando makes a defiant move.

episodes.name: Chapter 07: Fog
episodes.overview: Fernando finds an unlikely new ally. Michele undergoes a mysterious procedure. A crisis leaves Rafael torn between Elisa and his mission.

episodes.name: Chapter 08: Frogs
episodes.overview: Joana finds herself at the mercy of a figure from her past, Michele is led to a remote hiding place, and Marcela receives an unexpected invitation.

episodes.name: Chapter 09: Necklace
episodes.overview: While Rafael, Fernando and Joana forge ahead with their plan, Michele discovers a shocking secret about the Offshore's past.

episodes.name: Chapter 10: Blood
episodes.overview: Last-minute setbacks force Fernando and Joana to improvise. As chaos erupts on the day of the Process, Michele concocts a plan of her own.

episodes.name: Chapter 01: Sand
episodes.overview: Just as Joana tours Michele's new desert sanctuary, known as the Shell, a massive sandstorm moves in and wreaks havoc.

episodes.name: Chapter 02: Scalpel
episodes.overview: While the residents of the Shell prepare for the next stage of the Selection, Joana summons allies from the Cause and reveals her master plan.

episodes.name: Chapter 03: Medicine
episodes.overview: Forced to stand in for Michele on the next test, Elisa finds herself longing for the Offshore. Artur struggles to hide his condition from Rafael.

episodes.name: Chapter 04: Duck
episodes.overview: With supplies dwindling, Michele hurries to cut the Shell's remaining population in half. In flashbacks, the Founding Couple face an agonizing dilemma.

episodes.name: Chapter 05: Lever
episodes.overview: Glória whips up support for her campaign, leading to chaos at the Shell. Marco resorts to desperate measures when he runs out of food for his son.

episodes.name: Chapter 06: Trapdoor
episodes.overview: With the Offshore contingent on the way, the Shell's new residents scour the desert for the fugitives. Elisa grapples with painful memories.

episodes.name: Chapter 07: Gardrone
episodes.overview: While Joana and Rafael race to find proof of the sabotage, Michele faces an angry crowd, and new details emerge about Glória's time in the Process.

episodes.name: Chapter 08: Wave
episodes.overview: The truth about the sabotage finally comes to light as Marcela prepares to take over the Shell -- and carry out a secret personal mission.

episodes.name: Chapter 01: Moon
episodes.overview: When a group from the Shell is invited to the Offshore, Joana sees a chance for revenge. But she soon becomes distracted by unsettling memories.

episodes.name: Chapter 02: Shock
episodes.overview: After a surprise announcement from André, Michele begins training Xavier for a different kind of mission. Verônica escorts Joana to a secret meeting.

episodes.name: Chapter 03: Fire
episodes.overview: As the group prepares to raid the RTC, Glória makes a fateful deal, Michele finds herself trapped, and Rafael reconnects with a familiar face.

episodes.name: Chapter 04: Submarine
episodes.overview: Forced to resort to plan B, Joana and the others flee to an underground hideout, where Natália wrestles with a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Chapter 05: Painting
episodes.overview: As panic sweeps through the Offshore, Marcela scrambles to restore order, and Marco discovers his mother isn't the only family member on the island.

episodes.name: Chapter 06: Buttons
episodes.overview: With tensions rising and rumors spreading fast, André locks down the Process building and presents four candidates with a harrowing final test.

episodes.name: Chapter 07: Sun
episodes.overview: Waking up to a new reality, the Inland and Offshore factions inch closer to the brink of war — until a long-lost artifact offers a ray of hope.
